de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.mlprocess
Class WEKARunner

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.mlprocess.WEKARunner

public class WEKARunner
extends java.lang.Object

An interface class to access the WEKA API.
Several parts of the code are taken from the WEKA Wiki and adapted to our needs in order to classify a single instance.
To use this class, WEKA 3.7.1 is needed and to be placed in the resource folder.

labelUnknownInstance

public double labelUnknownInstance(weka.core.Instance instance)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Classifies a single Instance.
The class attribute, which is a numeral representation (representing the position) of the label, must be resolved by the caller.

Parameters:
instance - Instance to be classified.
Returns:
A numeral representation of the class attribute.
Throws:
If - the Instance couldn't be labeled.
java.lang.Exception
